PageTitle: peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate(BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view/BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view)(group)
FuncDef:
The peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command activates the g-shut feature of a peer group.
The undo peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command restores the default configuration. The peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command activates the g-shut feature of a peer group. The undo peer graceful-shutdown manual-activate command restores the default configuration. By default, the g-shut feature of a peer group is not activated.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance IPv4 address family view,BGP-VPN instance IPv6 address family view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a peer group.
The name is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, with spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.
